data.scheme_name: Maharashtra Maritime Development Policy, 2023 - Fiscal incentives for Shipyards - New
data.benefits: The scheme provides up to 50% WFR exemption for raw material procurement, stamp duty exemptions, SGST exemptions for inputs and ship sales, industrial power tariff for 7 years, reimbursement of electricity duty, project-specific incentives, and access to State Industrial and Shipbuilding Financial Assistance Policies.
data.eligibility: A newly established shipyard specifically engaged in shipbuilding activities.
data.conditions:
The unit should obtain prior approvals for incentives from relevant authorities, including MMB and MERC. 

The unit should comply with provisions of the State Industrial Policy and Shipbuilding Financial Assistance Policy.
data.beneficiaries: A newly established shipyard specifically engaged in shipbuilding activities.
data.prerequisites:
The unit should obtain prior approvals for incentives from relevant authorities, including MMB and MERC. 

The unit should comply with provisions of the State Industrial Policy and Shipbuilding Financial Assistance Policy.
data.context: The Maharashtra Maritime Development Policy 2023 introduced to enhance port infrastructure, attract private investment, and promote sustainable maritime practices.
data.objective: The primary goal of this scheme is to enhance connectivity, promote coastal shipping, and advance skill development within the maritime sector.
data.description:
Water Front Royalty (WFR) Exemption: 

Up to 50% exemption for raw material procurement in shipbuilding for 5 years. 

Stamp Duty Exemption: No stamp duty on first instruments related to shipyard development and operations. 

SGST Exemption (Construction): SGST exemption on inputs required during the construction phase of shipyards. 

SGST Exemption (Ship Sales): No SGST on the sale of ships and vessels manufactured in Maharashtra for 7 years. 

Industrial Power Tariff: Industrial power tariff applicable for 7 years from shipyard commissioning, upon MERC approval. Electricity Duty Reimbursement: No electricity duty during the construction phase of shipyards.
data.how_to_apply: The applicant can apply through the link: https://aaplesarkar.mahaonline.gov.in/
data.funding_mechanism: The applicant will get the incentives after the approval of concerned authority.
data.checklist_info_a:
Detailed Project report (DPR)
Land Allotment Documents
No objection certificate (NOC)
Permits from MMB
Business Proof
Details of Business
Details of Ownership
KYC Details
Other documents as required
